item.title: Trump to Dems, Republicans: 'Work Together' to End Shutdown
item.description: President Donald Trump is urging Democrats and Republicans to work together to reopen the federal government.

item.title: Trump: GOP Should 'Nationalize' Elections
item.description: President Donald Trump said in an interview Monday that Republicans should nationalize elections.
